item.title: First post
item.description:
So after many time I finally decided to start using a static site generator, specifically Hugo. In general I believe this will help me make my content more easy and I will not have to screw around all day with html and css, not because I hate it but because it’s very tiresome the copypaste.

Another thing to note is that before choosing Hugo I tried JBake and Jekyll, I enjoyed the first hours of JBake not before realizing the lack of public themes to choose from… and with Jekyll it was a pain to install on Wingblows and I don’t enjoy having to setup Cywing or having to use WSL.

And before leaving my old repository to rest… shotouts to Jaafar for letting me copy some of the project files made for his webpage.

item.title: hiking's curated list of F-droid apps
item.description:
A curated list of some worth checking applications in the F-droid repo (and others too), short descriptions and notes are listed below.

Table of Contents

  1. Browsers
  2. File managers
  3. Gallery
  4. EXIF / Metadata editors
  5. Music players
  6. Video players
  7. F-droid clients
  8. RSS clients
  9. E-mail clients
  10. Password Manager
  11. Social Media clients
  12. Keyboards
  13. Launchers
  14. 2FA
  15. Games

Browsers

  1. Fennec F-Droid

    • Browser that supports current and anticipated web standards.

  2. Bromite

    • Bromite is a Chromium fork with ad blocking and enhanced privacy; take back your browser.

    • Note: Custom repo is required .

  3. Privacy Browser

    • A web browser that respects your privacy.

    • Note: Uses WebView as their rendering engine.

  4. Tor Browser

    • Experience real private browsing without tracking, surveillance, or censorship.

    • Note: Custom repo is required

File managers

  1. Simple File Manager

    • A simple file manager for browsing and editing files and directories.

  2. Material Files

    • Open source Material Design file manager.

  3. Amaze

    • Manage local files.

Gallery

  1. Simple Gallery Pro

    • A premium app for managing and editing your photos, videos, GIFs without ads.

    • Note: This app is part of a collection of Simple Apps.

EXIF / Metadata editors

  1. Imagepipe

    • Removes exif data and modifies images to reduce size before sharing.

  2. Scrambled Exif

    • Remove the metadata from your pictures before sharing them.

Music players

  1. Vanilla Music

    • Listen to and manage songs.

(Add more here)

Video players

  1. VLC

    • The best video and music player. Fast and “just works”, plays any file.

  2. mpv

    • mpv-android is a video player for Android based on libmpv.

F-droid clients

  1. F-Droid

    • The app store that respects freedom and privacy.

    • Note: Users with root privileges may want to add: F-Droid Privileged Extension, however having a rooted device may compromise some of your security.

  2. Foxy Droid

    • Yet another F-Droid client.

  3. Aurora Droid

    • An alternative to the default F-Droid app with an intuitive UI and multiple great features…

    • Note: Not to get confused with the Play Store client Aurora Store.

RSS clients

  1. Feeder

    • An awesome Free and Open Source RSS Feed reader.

E-mail clients

  1. K-9 Mail

    • Full-featured email client.

    • NOTE: For new design, choose the latest release, not the recommended release.

  2. FairEmail

    • Fully featured email client. Neat, intuitive user interface. Privacy friendly.

Password Manager

  1. Bitwarden

    • Open Source Password Management for You and Your Business

  2. KeePassDX

    • Secure and open source password manager compatible with KeePass files.

Social Media clients (Reddit, Facebook, etc)

  1. Slide

    • Companion app for reddit.

  2. Frost for Facebook

    • A fast and extensive third party wrapper for Facebook.

    • Note: Not to be confused with the Icon pack with a similar name

  3. Barinsta

    • Simple yet advanced Instagram client.

    • Note: Used to be called InstaGrabber.

  4. Element (Riot.im)

    • Secure decentralised chat & VoIP. Keep your data safe from third parties.

  5. NewPipe

    • Lightweight YouTube frontend.

    • Note: Also has his own repository.

Keyboards

  1. AnySoftKeyboard

    • We live in a world full of languages. Why not use a multi-lingual keyboard?

    • Note: This application in F-droid keeps getting their logo changed every day, this is their F-droid package link .

  2. OpenBoard

    • An opensource keyboard that does not spy on you!

Launchers & Icon Packs

  1. KISS launcher

    • Blazingly fast launcher focused on search.

  2. Frost

    • Monotone icon pack.

2FA

  1. Aegis

    • Free, secure and open source 2FA app to manage tokens for your online services.

Games

  1. Shattered Pixel Dungeon

    • A roguelike game based on Pixel Dungeon.

  2. Mindustry

    • A factory-based sandbox tower defense game.

No category (for now)

OsMand~ ProtonVPN OpenCamera P!n ClassyShark3xodus Binary Eye xBrowserSync Yet Another Call Blocker WiFi Analyzer MuPDF viewer Recorder monerujo MoneyWaller SyncThing
